books.description: A memoir about growing up in South Africa by the host of “The Daily Show." Read by the author. 8 hours, 50 minutes unabridged.

books.description: Essays by the actress and activist on love, step-parenting and living beyond personal tragedy. Read by the author. 7 hours, 48 minutes unabridged.

books.description: The star of “Homicide Hunter” reveals cases that were not televised. Read by the author. 8 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.

books.description: A personal account of how psychedelics might help the mentally ill and people dealing with everyday challenges. Read by the author. 13 hours, 34 minutes unabridged.
